Articles.Content:
Perhaps I'm blind, but I can't seem to find where the TWR gauge is in the HUD.  I know where it is in KSP1, but here I've had to rely on a mod to give me this information.

Someone help a guy out?
The only reading currently is in engineers report in VAB. No sign of it in flight.

In KSP1 you could check the mass of your ship while in flight.  No sign of that in KSP2.  I guess you could estimate if you pay attention to the mass in the VAB.


Happy landings!
They only thing even vaguely resembling an acceleration gauge in flight right now is the g-force indicator on your crew portraits. And those are not very helpful =/
Well, looks like micro-engineer for the win.
